subtitles.text: Good morning everyone!

Chotto Kisei's early morning is now
starting!
Are you all awake?

I wonder if there are people watching
in the futon right now.
Or on the train.
This is so comfortable.
I love this space.
It's so relaxing.
It's a good morning to stay overnight.
Let's introduce ourselves.

I'm Tsujino Kanami, aka the super-
excited blue Kanamin.

I'm the super-excited pink Haruka, aka
Koizumi Haruka.

I'm the super-excited green Hiyorin,
aka Yoshikawa Hiyori.

We're all blue characters, so please
take care of us.

This program is brought to you by the
students who work hard to promote
something exciting.
The future is promising!
Thank you for watching!

This time, we are going to read the
contents of Julia, Hitoka and Aki's blog
and talk about it.
It's the first time to read a blog.
It's embarrassing.
It's the first time to read a blog.
It's embarrassing.
I don't want to read it.
It's embarrassing.
Let's read it.
I will read Julia's blog.
Julia, September 14th, 2020.

You have been in the business for 11
months.
11 months?

You have been in the business for 11
months since you made your debut today.

You have been in the business for 2
years.
Great!

You have been in the business for 2
years.

By the way, the anniversary of
MondayJr. and 14th is the same day.

It's been a long time since October
14th last year.
What? It's the same day?

I thought it was the first anniversary
since MondayJr.
It's cute.

MondayJr. updates its blog every
Monday, Monday, and Sunday.

I thought it was hot in summer until
recently.
Isn't it cute?
I thought so.

It's cool in the morning and evening
and autumn.
I can sleep without air conditioning.
Air conditioning?
I mean, air conditioner.

I thought it was hot to wear long
sleeves today.

I went to school in the morning and
wore long sleeves because I was in the
school.
It was cold.
It was cold.
What's the content of this?
It's okay.

It was cold to wear long sleeves even
in the school.

I have been eating chestnuts a lot in
the autumn.

I eat chestnut rice or chestnut honey
with ice cream.

I mix it with pancakes and drink Marron
Frappuccino.
I also ate chestnut parfait.
They were all delicious.
Did you eat chestnuts this year?
I ate chestnuts this year.
Congratulations

I haven't watched TV much, so I was
able to join the entertainment world and
of course the idol world without knowing
anything.

I can't believe it will be 2 years next
month.

It was my first time doing everything
twice, every time, and every time.

It was the first time I've had so many
exciting things in a row, and they were
all wonderful experiences.
This summer was special anyway.
The best!
I'm glad I was able to do it.

It was mostly a live broadcast, but I'm
grateful to everyone who supports us.

Thank you so much for always supporting
us.
Please continue to support us.

I'll probably write the same thing next
month.

I think it's similar to what you're
writing.

And this corner is a question from
Julia.
What day is it today?

Today, September 14th, is Men's
Valentine's Day.
What is that? Did you know?

It's a day when men express their love
for women.

In 1991, the Japanese Body Fashion
Association established it.
What?
It's a weird feeling.
October 11th, Tuesday.

It's been a while since we had a live
show.

We'll show you a lot of fun and intense
live performance.
We're waiting for you.
I see.
How about you?
How about you?
It's too cute.

A man who actively expresses his love
for a woman.
How about you?
It's cute.

Wednesday is Aki-chan.
Wednesday is Aki-chan.
Friday is Yori-chan.
It's a great show.
It's already our second anniversary.

It's been a while since we had a live
show.

It's like we've been here the other
day.
Aki-chan came here two days ago.
We didn't talk at first.
But now we're talking a lot.
Julia talks to us a lot.
Please look forward to the next video!
We've really grown up.

Next week, we'll be celebrating our 2nd
anniversary.
Congratulations!

And, ZIP HANADA!

We are so grateful to have such a great

On July 18th, we will hold a concert

We will perform at the venue and we
will go home with a great performance.
I'm so happy.

I'm so happy.

I'm glad that all the members did a

personality.

I praised myself.

The members and staff of Team Super
Rare are there.
They care about me.
I can do my best.

I can't do what I want, but I hope for
a bright future.

And I hope Team Super Rare will be
fine.

When I entered the venue of Super
Arena, I was worried that I would be too
big and feel small.
I was worried if I could dance well.

I was worried if I could dance well and

this venue during the rehearsal.

I thought it would be beautiful if

with everyone someday.

Did I deliver it well?
